name: ShippersGuideToTheGalaxy
profile:
For the fangirl and fanboy in all of us who is just as invested in their headcanon and the pairings that live there as in their own relationships. Tune in for fun and quirky histories, discussions and just overall wackiness considering all things ship and more...

Support on Patreon to be involved in choosing at least one of the videos each month. Get early access to behind the scenes content and more!

https://www.patreon.com/shippersguide
